'''Khvarena Inscription Fragments''' are items that can be found in the [[Girdle of the Sands]], [[Sumeru]]. They are used during the World Quest [[Monumental Study]], which is automatically obtained when one of the fragments is picked up.

The fragments are only visible and obtainable while the player is [[Sorush (Gadget)|Sorush]].
